Question.Subject: How long does it take for play.com to deliver?
Question.Content:
I ordered a graphics card for my computer off play.com on Tuesday and it still hasnt come, I was wondering how long it will take
( I also ordered Battlefield 2 and that came on friday but I dont see why they couldnt deliver them at the same time, they were both arounf Â£40 )
Question.ChosenAnswer: its normaly 7 to 5 days but not all products come from play some come from different shops or stores and it depends on whos delivering it :)

Answer.Content: its normaly 7 to 5 days but not all products come from play some come from different shops or stores and it depends on whos delivering it :)
